parameters: \N<Lev>Do you think... I could join you?
A lonely pair of gloves rest on the small platform.
\N<Dirk>If you're able to beat me, I'll join you.
\N<Dirk>Be prepared, though. It won't be easy.
\N<Dirk>Tough guy... are you looking for a fight?!
\N<Dirk>I'll be here for when you want me to join.
\N<Dirk>I'll be here for if you want me...
A piece of technology is laying on the ground.
It looks very complicated. However, you still pick it
Behind it is a small charm as well!
You are at the area east of the start.
You are at the area east of the start.
Would you like to read it?
The usefulness of guard & an explanation of Skills:
Skills are a useful tool to use when you've run out of
mana, since they don't cost any MP to use, and only
SP stands for "Stall Points." You gain SP through
getting hit, guarding, and a little from landing
your basic attack. There are also other specific
Most of the time, it's better to alternate between
guarding and using a skill instead of simply attacking,
since guarding restores 12 SP, which is a lot!
You also automatically restore 5 SP every turn by
default, so guarding actually restores 17 SP!
Also, guarding will decrease the amount of damage you
take for one turn, obviously, but it also has a hidden
use in that it will increase the chance of you
The next time you're in a sticky situation, just keep
in mind that the guard option is avalible to you!
